Message:
Today’s the day I’ve waited
so long for—the Flower Festival!
There’s no better day of the year
for making friends than this!

But, since I’ve always been
too sickly to even go to school,
I’ve spent most of my days
all alone in my room.

All I’ve ever wanted
was someone to share
those words with—
a friend.

I wanted a friend so bad,
I even kept chugging down
that bitter, icky medicine
this whole time!

Now, it’s time to head
for that festival!

...Wait, what’s a girl doing
collapsed in front of my house?!
